com.github.lucbui.gba.gfx

Class GBATile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.lucbui.gba.gfx.GBATile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GBAGraphic, Serializable

    public class GBATile
extends Object
implements GBAGraphic, Serializable
    A class which encapsulates a GBA Tile.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • GBATile

        protected GBATile(BitDepth depth)
        Creates an empty GBATile, filled with 0s
        Parameters:
        depth - The bitdepth of this tile.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - depth is null;

      • GBATile

        protected GBATile(BitDepth depth,
                  byte[] pixels)
        Create a GBATile from a BitDepth and 64 length array of pixels.
        Parameters:
        depth - The bit depth to use.
        pixels - The pixel values.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - depth or pixels are null
        IllegalSizeException - Pixel array is not AREA_IN_PIXELS size

    • Method Detail

      • getHexer

        public static Hexer<GBATile> getHexer(BitDepth depth)
        Get a Hexer that writes GBATiles
        Parameters:
        depth - The bitDepth to use.
        Returns:
        The created hexer

      • getPixel

        public int getPixel(int x,
                    int y)
        Get the pixel at the specified x/y position. Origin is top-left corner.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate to retrieve.
        y - The y coordinate to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The pixel value at the specified coordinate.
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - x or y is not in the tile space

      • modify

        public GBATile.Creator modify()
        Modify this tile. This returns a Creator which modifies the current tile. The tile returned from the creator is an all-new tile built from this one.
        Returns:
        A creator, populated with this tile's information.

      • build

        public static GBATile.Creator build(BitDepth bitDepth)
        Create a tile.
        Parameters:
        bitDepth - The bitDepth of this tile.
        Returns:
        A creator to create a tile.
